name: Breaking Turrets
description:
This is the final release I will make, excluding bug fixes

Please contact me with any feedback/advice at gametesting@wrac4242.com

General instructions:

WASD to move

Esc to quit the game

Arrow points to the ending, currently, just get to the orange-coloured room, there isnt an end screen yet

You can place down turrets using left click, left click again to remove them

they slowly die over time, except if adjacent to you, where they regain hitpoints

Rooms with paths in have enemies spawning in them

these enemies follow the path layed out

if you press space in a room, enemies start spawning

if they reach the end, the room resets

turrets shoot at the enemies, and all enemies need to be defeated before the doors open

you have a maximum number of turrets, shown on your bottom bar, you gain more as you complete rooms
